title: k2-fsa / 夏尔巴-onnx
description: 基于下一代 Kaldi 与 onnxruntime 的语音转文本、文本转语音、说话人日志、语音增强、源分离和语音活动检测工具，无需网络连接。支持嵌入式系统、Android、iOS、HarmonyOS、树莓派、RISC-V、x86_64 服务器、Websocket 服务端/客户端，兼容 12 种编程语言 | 获赞：7,832 复刻：908
titleZh: k2-fsa / 夏尔巴-onnx

descriptionZh: 基于下一代 Kaldi 与 onnxruntime 的语音转文本、文本转语音、说话人日志、语音增强、源分离和语音活动检测工具，无需网络连接。支持嵌入式系统、Android、iOS、HarmonyOS、树莓派、RISC-V、x86_64 服务器、Websocket 服务端/客户端，兼容 12 种编程语言 | 获赞：7,832 复刻：908

titleEn: Unitree Releases H2 Bionic Humanoid Robot; DeepSeek Open-Sources New Model; Weibo CEO Responds to Multiple KOLs Being Banned | Geek Headlines
descriptionZh: 优树科技正式发布新一代仿生人形机器人Unitree H2；
descriptionEn: Unitree Technology has officially released its new generation bionic humanoid robot Unitree H2; The DeepSeek-AI team published the paper "DeepSeek-OCR: Contexts Optical Compression", proposing a new method to compress long-text contexts using visual modality compression. The Hugging Face page shows this model has 3B parameters.
